title: Advancing Civic Education in the Digital Age
excerpt: Exploring how technology can enhance civic learning and democratic participation among students.
content:
This article explores the intersection of technology and civic education, highlighting innovative approaches to democratic learning.

Key Findings

Our research shows significant improvements in student engagement when digital tools are properly integrated.

author.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
author.title: Director of Civic Education Research
author.bio: Dr. Johnson is a leading expert in civic education with over 15 years of experience.
